a person who studies or is an expert in sinology (= Chinese language, literature, history, society, etc.): The leading sinologist of his day, he published several Chinese dictionaries. These buildings have been studied by leading sinologists and experts in traditional Chinese architecture. See
sinology
More examplesFewer examplesAt least one noted sinologist has shed serious doubt on whether Marco Polo went to China at all.Few sinologists bother to report on the lively debates among the country's thinkers and policy-makers.Her sister was married to an eminent sinologist.
